ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Newbie Dwarf Paladin
ygData.msgSnippet: I would say that you should do all your newbie armor quests (Underfoot Defenders), which are given out by a guy in the paladin guild (cannot remember his name
ygData.messageBody:
I would say that you should do all your newbie armor quests (Underfoot
Defenders), which are given out by a guy in the paladin guild (cannot
remember his name for the life of me, but go around hailing everyone in the
guild and following their leads).

That should get you to level 10 or so and give you a halfway decent set of
armor and a decent weapon to boot.

Welcome to EverCrack! It is a GREAT game.

Froondor 43 wood elf druid
Texxas 35 wood elf ranger
Froondar 31 wood elf warrior
Froonella 29 high elf cleric
Squiddles 14 high elf magician
Froonvah 13 vah shir beastlord
Squidd 11 high elf enchanter
Ferfee 10 dwarf warrior
